description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2023-03-24 at 14:00 EDT. All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) has the requirement for the supply and delivery of one (1) Single Cell Printer.
